home.heading: Foundation making for everyone.
home.text: Our specialty is 3D printed honeycomb rollers, designed to revolutionize the way you extract honey. With 3D printing, we have made this technology more affordable and accessible for beekeepers of all levels. Our 3D printed honeycomb rollers are not only cost-effective, but they also come with the added benefit of easy repair, as spare parts are readily available. Join us in embracing the future of beekeeping technology and make your honey extraction process easier, more efficient, and more sustainable with our 3D printed honeycomb rollers.

about.who_are_we_header: Who are we and what is our story?
about.who_are_we_content: We are a manufacturing facility based in Bulgaria that specialises in producing 3D printed products. We make our rollers affordable without compromising their durability because what we value most is the quality of the product and the satisfaction of the user.
about.our_team_content: We are a group of engineering students and together with professionals in the beekeeping area we worked hard and extensively to create a honeycomb roller that will be of use for small and large beekeepers.
about.our_mission_and_values_content: The goal we had set for ourself to achieve was to give an alternative to beekeepers, that is both effective and affordable. We also made sure that the materials used in production are 100% harmless to the bees (officially certified). What we value most is quality and that’s why our rollers are made with the best possible polymers found on the market.

contact.visit_distributors: Visit one of our distributor locations or contact us today
contact.send_message_sub: Have a question? Leave us a message, we love to hear from you!
